label.title: Label
label.description: Label to help identify the image.

data.title: Data
data.description:
As an alternative to the URL and only when the source data is small,
like an SVG, the raw data may be provided using Base64 encoding.

description.title: Description
description.description: Details of what the image represents.

alt.title: Alt
alt.description: Alternative text if the image cannot be shown.

height.title: Height
height.description: Height of the image in pixels.

width.title: Width
width.description: Width of the image in pixels.

digest.title: Digest
digest.description:
Digest can be used to ensure the image contained at the URL
is the same one as originally intended.

Image.description: Image describes a logo or photo that represents an entity.
